name: Kept  Styled Organic STYLING CREAM ~ (SMOOTH SPICE)
description:
Kept Styled can be used for a variety of styles & textures of hair. A lightweight cream with all the benefits of a heavy cream. Best to define, tame frizz while adding softness & shine to the hair. Great for shorter styles as a softer pomade. Terrific to use as a thermal protection cream prior to flat ironing. 

Directions:
Can be used in damp & dry hair. Slather a small amount in both hands, run hands though hair & style as usual.

All ingredients are ORGANIC and or WILDCRAFTED

Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate, organic shea butter, organic brown rice syrup, hemp seed oil, organic carrier oils of: almond, grapeseed and sesame, organic herbal infusions of: bilberry, natural vitamin C via bioflavonoids, calendula flowers, slippery elm, fennel seed, chickweed, neem leaf, skullcap, ginkgo leaf, hawthorn berry, green tea marshmallow root, St. John’s Wort and alfalfa, organic extracts of: rosemary, burdock, horsetail, sage, oregano, thyme, lavender, peppermint, cinnamon and lemon peel, organic apple cider vinegar, plant sourced kosher potassium sorbate and xanthan gum, palm and cottonwood extract; organic essential oils of cardamom, fennel  and spikenard.

GLUTEN FREE

name: Kept Revived Organic VOLUMIZING CONTROL SERUM (CREAMSICLE)
description:
This is Kept’s most outstanding product! Revived is the perfect blow dry companion for all types & textures of hair creating a lightweight style & a brilliant shine with a no product feel. This serum creates tons of volume at the root, while smoothing & sealing the ends. 

Directions:
Spread a dime sized amount into both hands. Disperse serum evenly from scalp to ends; blow dry & style as usual. If using on curly textures you can turn head upside down & scrunch; diffuse or dry naturally.

All ingredients are ORGANIC and or WILDCRAFTED

Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate,organic non-GMO certified organic corn extract, organic jojoba oil, organic olive oil, organic grape seed oil, organic apricot oil and organic evening primrose oil, plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate, organic essential oils of: rosemary, citrus.

GLUTEN FREE

name: Kept Detangled Organic LEAVE IN TREATMENT ~ (CREAMSICLE/COCONUT)
description:
This Leave-In spray/detangler is the perfect reparative & moisturizing treatment for dry tangled tresses. Splendid for refreshing next day hair. Chemical free & safe for children!

Directions:
Use all over on damp towel dried hair, or spray directly onto tangled area on dry hair. If using to refresh, spray lightly over entire head then gently fluff or scrunch hair from ends to roots.

All ingredients are ORGANIC and or WILDCRAFTED

Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate (aqua), organic jojoba oil, organic olive oil, organic grape seed oil, organic apricot oil, organic evening primrose oil, plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate, organic essential oils of: rosemary,peach extract/coconut extract

GLUTEN FREE

name: Kept In Place Organic HAIRSPRAY ~ (SWEET CITRUS/COCONUT)
description:
This 100% all natural, weightless & flexible hairspray provides the hold of a chemical spray without the toxins & alcohol that leave your hair feeling dry & damaged. Resists humidity & creates excellent volume while providing hold without leaving hair sticky or crunchy. Great for everyday use as well as up-do’s or special occasions. 

Directions:
For light long lasting hold, spray entire style. For Med-Firm hold spray, allow to dry & continue to layer product as needed.

All ingredients are ORGANIC and or WILDCRAFTED

Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate (aqua), organic non-GMO corn extract, vegetable glycerin, plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate; natural plant sourced vitamins A, C, & E, organic essential oils of: rosemary, vanilla, orange/coconut

name: Kept Curly Organic FOAM MOUSSE/ROOT BOOSTER (CITRUS/COCONUT)
description:
A Volumizing mousse that adds definition to curls & waves; leaving hair feeling soft, shiny & voluminous. Creates body and movement with just about any type of hair texture & length. Adds & builds in volume to thin & fine strands of hair. Most appropriate for certain hair styles, types and textures that require a softer or more natural look and hold.

Directions:
Spray mousse directly into roots & throughout the hair, start at roots working product into the scalp & scrunch. Let dry naturally or blow dry as usual.	

 Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate, organic non-GMO corn extract or white rice syrup, vegetable glycerin, organic herbal extracts of: black currant beet root, kham, thai and blueberry, natural plant sourced vitamins B1, B2, B3 and C,  wheat protein, extracts of organic peppermint, wild-crafted yucca, wild-crafted horsetail, organic nettle, organic melissa, plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate, organic African black soap, vitamin A, organic essential oils of: rosemary, citrus/coconut

name: Kept Fresh Organic POMADE SPRAY GEL ~ (CREAMSICLE)
description:
This unique product is a spray gel that is both workable & dries like pomade. Provides great volume & texture. Firm but not crunchy without any build up. Fabulous for any hair style from short & disheveled to long & curly. This is our go to product for keeping it fresh ♥

Directions:
For short styles, spray entire head, style as usual, allow to dry; continue to layer product for firmer results. For curly styles, flip hair upside sown, spray from ends to roots; scrunch in. May also be used as a root lifter.

All ingredients are ORGANIC and or WILDCRAFTED

Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate (aqua), certified organic aloe vera, organic non-GMO corn extract, vegetable glycerin, plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate, organic herbal extracts of: black currant, beet root, kham, thai and blueberry, vitamin  A, natural plant sourced vitamins B1, B2, B3 and C, organic essential oils of: rosemary, litsea cubeba, spearmint.

name: Kept Detoxified Organic SHAMPOO ~ BUILD UP & POLLUTANT REMOVAL ~(REFRESHING GRAPEFRUIT)
description:
Removes build up & residue within each hair follicle due to chemical styling products & environmental pollutants. NOTE: Kept’s styling products are 100% non toxic & do not leave any build up on the hair. Helps to expel any mineral deposits left in the hair by hard water, swimming pools & hot tubs. 


Directions:
Work shampoo into the scalp; proceed down through the ends of the hair. This shampoo does not contain sulphates and therefore will not lather like other chemical shampoos. 
During the first few uses, the shampoo will start the process of lifting chemical build up off of the scalp. As it goes through this process you may notice dry scalp & oils coming to the surface. This natural cleansing process will take at least 7 applications before hair & scalp is diminished of all chemicals & natural proper ph balance is restored.

All ingredients are ORGANIC and or WILDCRAFTED

Ingredients:

Structured vitamin water concentrate, distilled water, organic African black soap, organic oils of: jojoba, grapeseed, apricot & evening primrose; Organic vinegar, organic extracts of rosemary, burdock, horsetail, sage, oregano, thyme, lavender, peppermint, goldenseal, cinnamon, lemon peel, plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate,organic essential oils of:  orange & rosemary.

GLUTEN FREE

name: Kept Healthy Organic CONDITIONER ~ DRY FLAKING SCALP ~ (TANGY TEA TREE)
description:
Natural scalp soothing organic ingredients are combined with beneficial essential oils to help relieve flaking, itching & burning scalp. This tea tree infused formula is known to unblock the follicles of the hair. Blocked follicles can result in thinning of the hair & hair loss. This luxurious conditioner delivers a soothing moisture that will re balance the scalp & help the hair repair from the inside out.

Directions:
Spread a small amount in hands; Start at ends of hair scrunching in, working your way up. Can also flip hair upside down & work in from ends to roots. Leave in 5-10 minutes, Rinse throughly. 

All ingredients are ORGANIC and or WILDCRAFTED

Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate, coconut, olive oil ,organic hempseed oil, organic meadowfoam seed oil, herbal extracts of: rosemary, burdock, horsetail, sage, oregano, thyme, lavender, peppermint, goldenseal cinnamon, lemon peel, cottonwood, natural plant sourced vitamins E, A, B1, B2, B3, plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate ,organic vinegar organic essential oils of: lavender, tea tree and rosemary.

GLUTEN FREE

name: Kept Quenched Organic CONDITIONER ~ DRY DAMAGED HAIR ~  (CALMING LAVENDER)
description:
Essence of calming lavender create a soothing & relaxing experience. This rich conditioner smooths and protects the hair leaving it soft, shiny & manageable. The organic natural moisturizers help replenish dry, damaged hair restoring a silky smooth texture. 

Directions:
Spread a small amount into hands; Start at ends of hair scrunching in, working your way up. Can also flip hair upside down & work in from ends to roots. Leave in 5-10 minutes, Rinse thoroughly. 

All ingredients are ORGANIC and or WILDCRAFTED

Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate (aqua), organic shea butter, coconut, or olive oil, organic hempseed oil, organic meadowfoam seed oil, vitamin E, herbal extracts of: rosemary, burdock, horsetail, sage, oregano, thyme, lavender, peppermint, goldenseal, cinnamon, lemon peel and cottonwood, natural plant sourced vitamins E, A, B1, B2, B3, plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate; organic vinegar, organic essential oils of: lavender & rosemary.

name: Kept Quenched Organic SHAMPOO ~ DRY DAMAGED HAIR ~ (CALMING LAVENDER)
description:
Essence of calming lavender creates a soothing & relaxing shampooing experience. This chemical free shampoo cleanses & lifts build up off the hair and scalp. It re balances ph levels & brings the hair back to its natural healthy state. Restores moisture balance to dehydrated hair. Leaves hair smooth, soft & shining! 

Directions:
Work shampoo into the scalp; proceed down through the ends of the hair. This shampoo does not contain sulphates and therefore will not lather like other chemical shampoos. 
During the first few uses, the shampoo will start the process of lifting chemical build up off of the scalp. As it goes through this process you may notice dry scalp & oils coming to the surface. This natural cleansing process will take at least 7 applications before hair & scalp is diminished of all chemicals & natural proper ph balance is restored.

Ingredients:
Structured vitamin water concentrate (aqua), organic shea butter (butyrospermum parkii), organic oils of: coconut (cocos nucifera oil), meadowfoam (limnanthes alba), olive (olea europaea fruit oil) and hempseed (cannabis sativa seed oil), vegetable glycerin, organic herbal extracts of: rosemary (rosmarinus officinalis), burdock (arctium lappa), horsetail (equisetum arvense extract), sage (salvia officinalis), oregano (origanum vulgare), thyme (thymus vulgaris), lavender (lavender angustifolia), peppermint (mentha piperita leaf extract), goldenseal (hydratis canadensis), cinnamon (cinnamomum cassia bark), lemon peel (citrus medica limonum), palm (elaeis guineensis oil) and cottonwood natural plant sourced vitamins E (tocopherol), A (retinol), B1 (thiamine), B2 (lactoflavin) ,B3 (niacinamide) ,plant sourced kosher vegan xanthan gum & potassium sorbate, may contain organic vinegar (acetum) ,organic essential oils of: lavender (lavender angustifolia) & rosemary (rosmarinus officinalis).

GLUTEN FREE

description:
A pure chemical free conditioner that leaves hair feeling soft, silky & smooth. Provides perfect weightless conditioning to fine & limp hair. The organic natural proteins within the conditioner will strengthen thin fragile hair & promote better hair growth, thus  creating  glistening, light, natural looking beautiful hair.
